name.description: Name of this service instance. MUST BE LOWERCASE! Will also be used as a prefix in all supporting services.

virtual-host.description: Virtual Hostname for Marathon-LB webserver exposure outside cluster.

docker-credentials.description: URI to .dockercfg file with Docker credentials for retrieving private images.

logstash-address.description: Address for logstash service. When left empty logstash will deployed into the cluster.

elasticsearch-urls.description: ElasticSearch URL's for Scale. Note: Not needed if you use DCOS ElasticSearch package.

cpu.description: Allocation of CPU resources for Scale web server.

memory.description: Allocation of Memory (MiB) resources for Scale web server.

dcos-user.description: DCOS User for automation of supporting containers. This is only needed if DCOS Enterprise is installed.

dcos-pass.description: DCOS Password for automation of supporting containers. This is only needed if DCOS Enterprise is installed.

dcos-oauth-token.description: DCOS OAuth token for automation of supporting containers. This is only needed if OAuth is enabled.

db-host.description: Hostname to the database server. When left empty a sample database will be deployed. THIS DEFAULT SHOULD NEVER BE USED FOR PRODUCTION!

db-name.description: DB Name. This database must have the postgis extension already installed.
